sentences.english: But how could we disguise the fact that I was not [even] fifteen years old?
sentences.chinese: 可我们怎么才能掩饰我还不到15足岁的事实呢？

definition: one's age, according to the traditional Chinese method of reckoning (i.e. the number of Chinese calendar years in which one has lived). In this system, a person's age is one year at birth, and increases by one year at the beginning of the first solar term 立春[Li4 chun1] each year, rather than on one's birthday./as opposed to 足歲|足岁[zu2 sui4]/see also 實歲|实岁[shi2 sui4]
variant of 歲|岁[sui4], year/years old
classifier for years (of age)/year/year (of crop harvests)
method of calculating a person's age in years from birth/see also 虛歲|虚岁[xu1 sui4]/see also 足歲|足岁[zu2 sui4]

first year of the sixty-year cycle (where each year is numbered with one of the 10 heavenly stems 天干[tian1 gan1] and one of the 12 earthly branches 地支[di4 zhi1])/the sixty-year cycle
to reach marriageable age (a girl's fifteenth birthday)
